channel.title: Vulncheck KEV
channel.description: Newly added vulnerabilities to the VulnCheck KEV database

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2022-1026 - kyocera net_viewer Insufficiently Protected Credentials
item.description:
Kyocera multifunction printers running vulnerable versions of Net View unintentionally expose sensitive user information, including usernames and passwords, through an insufficiently protected address book export function.

Vendor: kyocera
Product: net_viewer

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-06-08&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2022-1026
VulnCheck XDB Entries:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6b662b0bb61c - https://github.com/ac3lives/kyocera-cve-2022-1026
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/14c28467eb93 - https://github.com/flamebarke/nmap-printer-nse-scripts

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2024-1086 - Linux Kernel Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description:
Linux kernel contains a use-after-free vulnerability in the netfilter: nf_tables component that allows an attacker to achieve local privilege escalation.

Date Added to CISA KEV: 2024-05-30T00:00:00Z
Vendor: Linux
Product: Kernel

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/feeds/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.json
VulnCheck XDB Entries:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/811b53a4b2e6 - https://github.com/CCIEVoice2009/CVE-2024-1086

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2018-4233 - Apple safari Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
item.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.4 is affected. Safari before 11.1.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.5 on Windows is affected. iTunes before 12.7.5 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.4 is affected. watchOS before 4.3.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.

Vendor: Apple
Product: safari

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://www.threatfabric.com/blogs/lightspy-implant-for-macos
VulnCheck XDB Entries:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/4ce5417935b7 - https://github.com/saelo/cve-2018-4233

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2023-6961 - WP Meta SEO plugin for WordPress Stored Cross-Site Scripting
item.description:
The WP Meta SEO plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Referer header in all versions up to, and including, 4.5.12 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

Vendor: Joomla
Product: WP Meta SEO plugin for WordPress

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://www.fastly.com/blog/active-exploitation-unauthenticated-stored-xss-vulnerabilities-wordpress/

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2018-4404 - Apple iphone_os Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
item.description:
In iOS before 11.4 and macOS High Sierra before 10.13.5, a memory corruption issue exists and was addressed with improved memory handling.

Vendor: Apple
Product: iphone_os

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://www.threatfabric.com/blogs/lightspy-implant-for-macos

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2024-21683 - Confluence Data Center and Server Remote Code Execution
item.description:
This High severity RCE (Remote Code Execution) vulnerability was introduced in version 5.2 of Confluence Data Center and Server. This RCE (Remote Code Execution) vulnerability, with a CVSS Score of 8.3, allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code which has high impact to confidentiality, high impact to integrity, high impact to availability, and requires no user interaction.  Atlassian recommends that Confluence Data Center and Server customers upgrade to latest version. If you are unable to do so, upgrade your instance to one of the specified supported fixed versions. See the release notes https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/confluence-release-notes-327.html You can download the latest version of Confluence Data Center and Server from the download center https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/download-archives. This vulnerability was found internally.

Vendor: Atlassian
Product: confluence_data_center

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-05-29&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2024-21683
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-05-31&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2024-21683
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-06-01&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2024-21683
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-06-04&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2024-21683
VulnCheck XDB Entries:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/29a71df0392d - https://github.com/phucrio/CVE-2024-21683-RCE
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/9c6e3d7ac91f - https://github.com/wjlin0/poc-doc

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2024-2194 - WP Statistics Plugin for WordPress Stored Cross-Site Scripting
item.description:
The WP Statistics plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the URL search parameter in all versions up to, and including, 14.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

Vendor: VeronaLabs
Product: WP Statistics Plugin for WordPress

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://www.fastly.com/blog/active-exploitation-unauthenticated-stored-xss-vulnerabilities-wordpress/

item.title: [vulncheck] CVE-2024-27130 - QNAP Operating System Authenticated Network Buffer Overflow
item.description:
A buffer copy without checking size of input vulnerability has been reported to affect several QNAP operating system versions. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow users to execute code via a network.

Vendor: QNAP
Product: QTS, QuTS hero

VulnCheck Reported Exploitation Citations:
  • https://dashboard.shadowserver.org/statistics/honeypot/vulnerability/map/?day=2024-05-27&host_type=src&vulnerability=cve-2024-27130
VulnCheck XDB Entries:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b140a4e5c640 - https://github.com/watchtowrlabs/CVE-2024-27130
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/fd3ef1157d3d - https://github.com/d0rb/CVE-2024-27130
